document_data.name: Nikolai
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nikolai''' was a resident of [[Baldur's Gate]] who lived in the city during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|For a mere 15 [[gp|pieces of gold]], I can tell you of the glorious history that once coursed through the weighted veins of this metropolis|Nikolai's sales pitch.}}
document_data.Activities: Nikolai was quite knowledgeable about the history of Baldur's Gate and would offer what he knew for the rather steep price of 15 [[gold pieces]]. He worked his pitch at a street crossing in the [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] neighborhood of the city, near the [[Blade and Stars]] inn, specifically seeking out people he suspected were new to the city.
